name: Makaptan (Kaptan)
shortLoreBlurb: Makaptan (Kaptan) is a deity from Philippines (Visayas) linked to sky god, lightning. Legends tie them to thunder, winds, and royal mandate.
description: Makaptan (Kaptan) is a deity from Philippines (Visayas) linked to sky god, lightning. Legends tie them to thunder, winds, and royal mandate.
